entry.title: A Prison of Red Lights
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,135Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 52

Summary: Dark, faded blue eyes flashed with moonlight.‚ÄúLet me go,‚Äù whispered Hyunjin, but his plea was met with a cold and unyielding stare. In a flash of almost inhuman speed, he was on his feet and the chains pulled taut as he strained against them. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt do anything! Let me go!‚ÄùChan didn‚Äôt flinch even as Hyunjin‚Äôs face came within centimeters of his own. ‚ÄúYou exist.‚ÄùThe chains stopped clanking as Hyunjin relaxed, leaning against the pull of the chains, giving his body the oddly distorted look of a marionette tangled in its strings, accentuated by the red glow overhead. He looked up at Chan again, their eyes meeting.Then he spat on his face.~~~Or my interpretation of the music video, "Red Lights" and how "Escape" is a continuation of the same story. A hunter and his captured prey grapple for control as they discover a connection deeper than their ingrained hatred for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.This is part one. "Escape" will be part two.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: What One Would do for One Goal
entry.summary:
Author: Chocolates_Flavor_is_Macha

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,959Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 146

Summary: Kim Seungmin's shop is almost completely done, but he needs one more thing. He needs a simple acceptance from the secret governing Magical Counsel, but they won't allow the young witch a shop without protection. He either needs a coven, or he needs a familiar, and he wants neither. This is because of his own past dealing with covens and his own personal family history. But he cannot legally run his shop without the Counsel's acceptance. With no signs of an answer, one of the biggest Crime bosses, Bahng Christopher Chan, just so happened to fall right into his backyard‚Äîa hole in his chest and little to no chance of surviving this. Well, Seungmin could do a lot worse than a powerful man like Chan. And besides, the Crime Boss has his own reason for survival, a simple goal that both men can accept. But it seems there's a lot more going on underneath the surface in both their lives, and they both have to work together to achieve their goals. Or die trying.
